mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.NEW_PEN_ORD_ID, 1, 14), LPAD( (SUBSTR(B.NEW_PEN_ORD_ID, 15, 6)) + 1 , 6, '0')) , CONCAT('ORDER-', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '000001') ) AS NEW_PEN_ORD_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.PEN_ORD_ID) AS NEW_PEN_ORD_ID FROM PEN5000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PEN_ORD_ID LIKE CONCAT('ORDER-', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') ) B

SELECT PEN.PEN_ORD_ID ,PEN.PEN_STA_SEQ ,PEN.PEN_ID ,PEN.USR_ID ,PEN.ENT_ID ,PEN.UUID ,PEN.PROD_ID ,PEN.PROD_NM ,PEN.ITEM_ID ,PEN.ITEM_NM ,PEN.PROD_OFL_PRICE ,PEN.PROD_PAY_CODE ,PEN.PROD_SIZE ,PEN.PROD_COLOR ,PEN.PROD_OPTION ,PEN.ORD_DTM ,PEN.DEL_GBN_CD ,PEN.ORD_WAY_NUM ,PEN.DEL_SER_CD ,PEN.ORD_NM ,PEN.ORD_CONT ,PEN.ORD_MEMO ,PEN.ORD_ZIP ,PEN.ORD_ADDR ,PEN.ORD_ADDR_DTL ,PEN.FIN_PAYMENT ,PEN.ORD_STATUS ,PEN.ORD_LEND_STR_DTM ,PEN.ORD_LEND_END_DTM ,PEN.PAY_MEH_CD ,PEN.STA_ORD_CD ,PEN.REASON ,PEN.EXTN_YN ,PEN.REG_DTM ,PEN.REG_USR_ID ,PEN.REG_USR_IP ,PEN.MODIFY_DTM ,PEN.MODIFY_USR_ID ,PEN.MODIFY_USR_IP ,PEN.EFORM_YN ,PEN.HIST_ID ,PEN.STO_ID ,PEN.LGS_STO_ID ,STOCK.PROD_BAR_NUM
,CONCAT(#{downloadUrl},'uuid=',PEN.UUID,'&path=',EFORM_FILE_PATH,'&gubn=',DOCUMENT_ID) AS EFORM_URL
FROM PEN5000 PEN LEFT JOIN (SELECT STO_ID, PROD_BAR_NUM FROM PRO1103) STOCK ON STOCK.STO_ID = PEN.STO_ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT UUID, EFORM_FILE_PATH, DOCUMENT_ID FROM eform_filelist_table WHERE DOCUMENT_ID = 'ALL') EFROM ON EFROM.UUID = PEN.UUID
WHERE PEN_ORD_ID = #{penOrdId} AND PEN_STA_SEQ = #{penStaSeq}
SELECT SUB_CD_REF1 FROM cmm1100 WHERE MST_CD = 'PEN00002' AND SUB_CD = (SELECT PEN_TYPE_CD FROM pen1000 WHERE PEN_ID = #{penId})
